title: Takeshi's
description:
Visit http://bikkuri.doesntexist.com

Takeshis&#039; is a 2005 Japanese film directed, written, edited by, and starring Takeshi Kitano.

The original working title of Takeshis&#039; was Fractal,[1] suggesting the film&#039;s structure. The film has nested storylines and depicts 8??-like identity crisis theme in autobiographical style. It is also strongly characterised by a series of surrealistic motives linked by chance encounters. The plot&#039;s vague, often detached narrative is a considerable source of humour within the film. It has been lauded as both an achievement of surreal comedy and a work of considerable editorial complexity.

A prominent theme of the movie is duality, as almost all the main characters appear in two forms or roles. Although it is hard to lay one&#039;s finger on the interpretation of this film, it can be said that self actualization is at least a major underlying theme.
